name: Vox Machina
description:
Vox Machina is a survival horror game where you must use sound to open doors and stun the dangerous enemies that lurk in the dark.

Created for Ludum Dare 48. Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Controls

W,A,S,D - Move

Left Mouse Button - Create Low (Red) Sounds

Right Mouse Button - Create High (Green) Sounds

Credits

Sound -  Christopher William McEwen

Art -  Jordan Jenkins

Code - Michael Wahba
